DataElement.preferredName: Dental Lesion Dental Restoration Reduced Occlusal Surface Margin Center Dimension Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed as a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator as related to lesion shrinkage dimension of replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure from the margin to the center in reference to the biting surfaces of the premolar and molar teeth.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental Lesion Dental Restoration Reduced Occlusal Surface Margin Center Dimension
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to lesion shrinkage dimension of replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure from the margin to the center in reference to the biting surfaces of the premolar and molar teeth.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.:Any observable abnormal structural change in a bodily part.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Any observable abnormal structural change in a bodily part.

Property.preferredName: Dental Restoration Reduced Occlusal Surface Margin Center Dimension
Property.preferredDefinition: Replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.:Reduced; made less in size or amount or degree.:The biting surfaces of the premolar and molar teeth.:Margin; the boundary line or the area immediately inside the boundary.:A point or area that is approximately central within some larger region or structure.:Dimension; the magnitude of something in a particular direction, especially length or width or height.

Concepts.definition: Replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.
Made less in size or amount or degree.
The biting surfaces of the premolar and molar teeth.
A boundary line or the area immediately inside the boundary.
A point or area that is approximately central within some larger region or structure.
The magnitude of something in a particular direction, especially length or width or height.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed as a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Length of occlusal margin wit
ReferenceDocuments.description: Length of occlusal margin with visible gap (expressed as percentage of total occlusal margin length)
